us.ihmc.euclid.geometry

Class Shape3D<S extends Shape3D<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.Shape3D<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the final type of this shape.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.EpsilonComparable<S>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.GeometricallyComparable<S>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.GeometryObject<S>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Settable<S>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Box3D, Cylinder3D, Ellipsoid3D, Ramp3D, Sphere3D, Torus3D

    public abstract class Shape3D<S extends Shape3D<S>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.GeometryObject<S>
    Base implementation for 3D shapes such as: cylinder, box, sphere, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape3D()
      Default constructor for creating a new shape with its local frame aligned with world.

      • Shape3D

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfInside

        public final boolean checkIfInside(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly pointToCheck,
                                   us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DBasics closestPointOnSurfaceToPack,
                                   us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Vector3DBasics normalAtClosestPointToPack)
        Evaluates the query point pointToCheck:
        • tests if the query is located inside this shape,
        • calculates the coordinates of the closest point to the query and on laying on the shape surface,
        • calculates the normal of the shape surface at the coordinates of the closest point to the query.
        Parameters:
        pointToCheck - the coordinates of the query to be evaluated. Not modified.
        closestPointOnSurfaceToPack - the closest point to the query that lies on the shape surface. Modified.
        normalAtClosestPointToPack - the surface normal at the closest point to the query. The normal points toward outside the shape. Modified.
        Returns:
        true if the query is inside this shape or exactly on its surface, false otherwise.

      • containsNaN

        public boolean containsNaN()
        Specified by:
        containsNaN in interface us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable

      • distance

        public final double distance(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly point)
        Calculates the minimum distance between the point and this shape.

        Note that if the point is inside this shape, this method returns 0.0.

        Parameters:
        point - the coordinates of the query. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the value of the distance between the point and this shape.

      • signedDistance

        public final double signedDistance(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly point)
        Returns minimum distance between the point and this shape.

        The returned value is negative if the point is inside the shape.

        Parameters:
        point - the coordinates of the query. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the distance between the query and the shape, it is negative if the point is inside the shape.

      • epsilonEqualsPose

        public boolean epsilonEqualsPose(Shape3D<S> other,
                                 double epsilon)
        Tests separately and on a per component basis if the orientation and the position of this shape's pose and other's pose are equal to an epsilon.
        Parameters:
        other - the other shape which its pose is to be compared against this shape's pose. Not modified.
        epsilon - tolerance to use when comparing each component.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses are equal component-wise, false otherwise.

      • evaluateQuery

        protected abstract double evaluateQuery(double x,
                                        double y,
                                        double z,
                                        us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DBasics closestPointOnSurfaceToPack,
                                        us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Vector3DBasics normalAtClosestPointToPack)
        Internal generic method used for the public API of any Shape3d.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the query expressed in the local coordinates of this shape.
        y - the y-coordinate of the query expressed in the local coordinates of this shape.
        z - the z-coordinate of the query expressed in the local coordinates of this shape.
        closestPointOnSurfaceToPack - closest point to the query expressed in the local coordinates of this shape. Modified. Can be null.
        normalAtClosestPointToPack - normal of the shape surface at the closest point. Modified. Can be null.
        Returns:
        the distance from the query to the closest point on the shape surface. The returned value is expected to be negative when the query is inside the shape.

      • isInsideOrOnSurface

        public final boolean isInsideOrOnSurface(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly query)
        Tests whether the given point is inside this shape or on its surface.
        Parameters:
        query - the coordinates of the query. Not modified.
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside or on the surface, false otherwise.

      • isInsideEpsilon

        public final boolean isInsideEpsilon(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly query,
                                     double epsilon)
        Tests if the query is located inside this shape given the tolerance epsilon.

        • if epsilon > 0, the size of this shape is increased by shifting its surface/faces by a distance of epsilon toward the outside.
        • if epsilon > 0, the size of this shape is reduced by shifting its surface/faces by a distance of epsilon toward the inside.

        Parameters:
        query - the coordinates of the query. Not modified.
        epsilon - the tolerance to use for this test.
        Returns:
        true if the query is considered to be inside this shape, false otherwise.

      • isInsideEpsilonShapeFrame

        protected abstract boolean isInsideEpsilonShapeFrame(double x,
                                                     double y,
                                                     double z,
                                                     double epsilon)
        Tests if the query is located inside this shape given the tolerance epsilon.

        • if epsilon > 0, the size of this shape is increased by shifting its surface/faces by a distance of epsilon toward the outside.
        • if epsilon > 0, the size of this shape is reduced by shifting its surface/faces by a distance of epsilon toward the inside.

        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the query expressed in the local coordinates of this shape.
        y - the y-coordinate of the query expressed in the local coordinates of this shape.
        z - the z-coordinate of the query expressed in the local coordinates of this shape.
        epsilon - the tolerance to use for this test.
        Returns:
        true if the query is considered to be inside this shape, false otherwise.

      • orthogonalProjection

        public final boolean orthogonalProjection(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DBasics pointToProject)
        Computes the orthogonal projection of a point on this shape.

        Edge cases:

        • If the query is inside the shape, the method fails and returns false.

        Parameters:
        pointToProject - the point to project on this shape. Modified.
        Returns:
        whether the method succeeded or not.

      • orthogonalProjection

        public final boolean orthogonalProjection(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly pointToProject,
                                          us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DBasics projectionToPack)
        Computes the orthogonal projection of a point this shape.

        Edge cases:

        • If the query is inside the shape, the method fails and returns false.

        Parameters:
        pointToProject - the coordinate of the point to compute the projection of. Not modified.
        projectionToPack - point in which the projection of the point onto this shape is stored. Modified.
        Returns:
        whether the method succeeded or not.

      • setOrientation

        public final void setOrientation(us.ihmc.euclid.orientation.interfaces.Orientation3DReadOnly orientation)
        Sets the orientation of this shape.

        This method does not affect the position of this shape.

        Parameters:
        orientation - the new orientation for this shape. Not modified.

      • setOrientationYawPitchRoll

        public final void setOrientationYawPitchRoll(double yaw,
                                             double pitch,
                                             double roll)
        Sets the orientation of this shape.

        This method does not affect the position of this shape.

        The given yaw, pitch, and roll angles are composed into a rotation matrix as follows: 

             / cos(yaw) -sin(yaw) 0 \   /  cos(pitch) 0 sin(pitch) \   / 1     0          0     \
 R = | sin(yaw)  cos(yaw) 0 | * |      0      1     0      | * | 0 cos(roll) -sin(roll) |
     \    0         0     1 /   \ -sin(pitch) 0 cos(pitch) /   \ 0 sin(roll)  cos(roll) /

        Parameters:
        yaw - the angle to rotate about the z-axis.
        pitch - the angle to rotate about the y-axis.
        roll - the angle to rotate about the x-axis.

      • setOrientationYawPitchRoll

        public final void setOrientationYawPitchRoll(double[] yawPitchRoll)
        Sets the orientation of this shape.

        This method does not affect the position of this shape.

        The given yaw, pitch, and roll angles are composed into a rotation matrix as follows: 

             / cos(yaw) -sin(yaw) 0 \   /  cos(pitch) 0 sin(pitch) \   / 1     0          0     \
 R = | sin(yaw)  cos(yaw) 0 | * |      0      1     0      | * | 0 cos(roll) -sin(roll) |
     \    0         0     1 /   \ -sin(pitch) 0 cos(pitch) /   \ 0 sin(roll)  cos(roll) /

        Parameters:
        yawPitchRoll - array containing the yaw-pitch-roll angles. Not modified.

      • getOrientationPitch

        public final double getOrientationPitch()
        Computes and returns the pitch angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of this shape orientation.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Returns:
        the pitch angle around the y-axis.

      • getOrientationRoll

        public final double getOrientationRoll()
        Computes and returns the roll angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of this shape orientation.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Returns:
        the roll angle around the x-axis.

      • getOrientationYaw

        public final double getOrientationYaw()
        Computes and returns the yaw angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of this shape orientation.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Returns:
        the yaw angle around the z-axis.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Parameters:
        yawPitchRollToPack - the array in which the yaw-pitch-roll angles are stored. Modified.

        public final void prependTranslation(double x,
                                     double y,
                                     double z)
        Translates this shape with the given (x, y, z) components that are expressed in the world coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-component of the translation to prepend to this shape pose.
        y - the y-component of the translation to prepend to this shape pose.
        z - the z-component of the translation to prepend to this shape pose.

      • prependTranslation

        public final void prependTranslation(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Tuple3DReadOnly translation)
        Translate this shape with the given translation that is expressed in the world coordinates.
        Parameters:
        translation - the translation to prepend to the pose of this shape. Not modified.

      • prependYawRotation

        public final void prependYawRotation(double yaw)
        Rotates this shape by angle of yaw about the z-axis of the world coordinates.
        Parameters:
        yaw - the angle to rotate about the local z-axis.

      • prependPitchRotation

        public final void prependPitchRotation(double pitch)
        Rotates this shape by angle of pitch about the y-axis of the world coordinates.
        Parameters:
        pitch - the angle to rotate about the local y-axis.

      • prependRollRotation

        public final void prependRollRotation(double roll)
        Rotates this shape by angle of roll about the x-axis of the world coordinates.
        Parameters:
        roll - the angle to rotate about the local x-axis.

      • transformToLocal

        public final void transformToLocal(us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable transformable)
        Changes the given transformable from being expressed in world to being expressed in this shape local coordinates.
        Parameters:
        transformable - the transformable to change the coordinates in which it is expressed. Modified.

      • transformToWorld

        public final void transformToWorld(us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable transformable)
        Changes the given transformable from being expressed in this shape local coordinates to being expressed in world.
        Parameters:
        transformable - the transformable to change the coordinates in which it is expressed. Modified.
